name: Mento
description: Mento, an open source and permissionless protocol live on the Celo network. It facilitates the launch of stablecoins such as cUSD, cEUR, and cREAL

name: SPOT Cash
description: The first durable decentralized flatcoin. SPOT is an inflation-resistant stable asset. Holders of SPOT benefit from durable long-term stability. Any SPOT holder can pair it with USDC to generate volume-based fees without impermanent loss by staking on Uniswap.
